name: Falcon Heavy
description:
In this classic vertical shooter you will have to go into outer space to try to destroy the alien ships that threaten the survival of planet Earth. Asteroids, galactic jellyfish and all kinds of ships will try to prevent you from reaching your goal: destroy the general control center.

HOW TO PLAY

Hold down the ship and you can move it around the stage.
In the TOOLS menu you can choose manual or automatic shooting mode. You can also turn on or off both the music and the sounds of the game.
